title: The Ever Fresh Nature of Krishna Katha | @madhupanditdasaofficial
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.text: It is said that the narration of the past times of the Lord is never satiating.
Never satiating means one does not become satisfied by hearing the past times of the Lord.
One wants to hear more and more and more and more.
In the material world, you are happy when you are satisfied.
In the spiritual world, when you are dissatisfied, you are happy.
So, as far as hearing the past times of the Lord, you are always dissatisfied.
Because it is so tasty that you are never satisfied.
Just like if we give you a tasty thing, then you are not satisfied because you want more of that tasty thing.
So, this is the nature of...
the absolute rasa which is emanating from Krishna.
